name: Current Solar
type: custom:sunsynk-card
entities: null
content: >-

  <style>
     div {
         border: solid 10px rgba(100, 100, 100, 0.1);
         border-radius: 10px;
         background-color: ;  <!= var(--card-background-color) ->
         padding: 5px;
         box-shadow: 0 1px 0px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4)
     }
  </style> <div> <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
  xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" version="1.1" width="100%"
  height="100%" viewBox="-0.5 -0.5 457 383">
         <defs />
         <g>
             <style type="text/css">
                 .st1 { fill: #ffcf30; }
                 .st2 { fill: #f3b3ca; }
                 .st3 { font-size: 9px; }
                 .st4 { font-size: 12px; }
                 .st5 { fill: #969696; }
                 .st6 { fill: #5fb6ad; }
                 .st7 { fill: #5490c2; }
                 .st8 { font-weight: 500 }
                 text { text-anchor: middle; alignment-baseline: middle; }
             </style> 

             <rect x="33.9%" y="83.5%" width="200" height="50" rx="7.5" ry="7.5" fill="none" stroke="#959595" pointer-events="all"/>
             <text id="battery_left" x="55%" y="92%" class="st2 st4 st8">0</text>
             <text x="55%" y="88%" class="st3 st7 st8">Battery Left to 20% SOC if no other power</text> 

             <text id="pv2_power_187" x="30%" y="18%" class="st1 st4 st8 ">0</text>    
             <text id="pv1_power_186" x="8%" y="18%" class="st1 st4 st8">0 </text> 
             <text id="pvtotal_power" x="19%" y="33.5%" class="st1 st4 st8">0</text> 
             <text x="4%" y="25%" class="st1 st3 st8">PV1</text>
             <text x="26%" y="25%" class="st1 st3 st8">PV2</text>  
             <text id="battery_voltage_183" x="9%" y="83%" class="st2 st4 st8">0</text>  
             <text id="battery_soc_184" x="9%" y="87.5%" class="st2 st4 st8">0</text> 
             <text id="battery_out_190" x="9%" y="92%" class="st2 st4 st8">0</text> 
             <text id="inverter_out_175" x="39.5%" y="46.5%" class="st4 st5 st8">0</text>  
             <text id="inverter_out_164" x="39.5%" y="52%" class="st4 st5 st8">0</text>  
             <text id="ess_power" x="59%" y="31%" class="st4 st6 st8">0</text>   
             <text x="90%" y="41%" class="st3 st6 st8">Essential</text>
             <text id="inverter_grid_voltage_154" x="59%" y="44.5%" class="st4 st7 st8">0</text>  
             <text id="inverter_load_freq_192" x="59%" y="49.5%" class="st4 st7 st8">0</text>  
             <text id="inverter_load_grid_167" x="59%" y="54.5%" class="st4 st7 st8">0</text>  
             <text id="grid_external_power_172" x="92%" y="73.5%" class="st4 st7 st8">0</text> 
             <text x="92%" y="98.5%" class="st3 st7 st8">Grid</text> 

             <rect x="51" y="112" width="70" height="30" rx="4.5" ry="4.5" fill="none" stroke="#ff9933" pointer-events="all"/>
             <rect x="0" y="54" width="70" height="30" rx="4.5" ry="4.5" fill="none" stroke="#ff9933" pointer-events="all"/>
             <rect x="101" y="54" width="70" height="30" rx="4.5" ry="4.5" fill="none" stroke="#ff9933" pointer-events="all"/>
             <rect x="6" y="300.75" width="70" height="70" rx="10.5" ry="10.5" fill="none" stroke="#f3b1c9" pointer-events="all" />
             <rect x="236" y="103" width="70" height="30"   rx="4.5" ry="4.5" fill="none" stroke="#5fb5ab" pointer-events="all"/>
             <rect x="234" y="153" width="70" height="70" rx="10.5" ry="10.5" fill="none" stroke="#558fc1" pointer-events="all"/>
             <rect x="386" y="265" width="70" height="30" rx="4.5" ry="4.5" fill="none" stroke="#558fc1" pointer-events="all"/>
             <rect x="145.15" y="162" width="70" height="50" rx="7.5" ry="7.5" fill="none" stroke="#959595" pointer-events="all"/>

             <path d="M 135 92 L 135 117 Q 135 127 128 127 L 121 127" fill="none" stroke="#ff9933" stroke-width="2" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="2 2" pointer-events="stroke"/>
             <path d="M 155 285.06 L 105.5 285.09 Q 95.5 285.1 95.5 290.92 L 95.5 296.75" fill="none" stroke="#f3b1c9" stroke-width="2" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="2 2" pointer-events="stroke" />
             <path d="M 35 92 L 35 117 Q 35 127 43 127 L 51 127" fill="none" stroke="#ff9933" stroke-width="2" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="2 2" pointer-events="stroke" />
             <path d="M 155 245.19 L 96 245.2 Q 86 245.2 86 235.2 L 86 142" fill="none" stroke="#ff9933" stroke-width="2" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="2 2" pointer-events="stroke"/>
             <path d="M 304 188 L 411 188 Q 421 188 421 198 L 421 265" fill="none" stroke="#558fc1" stroke-width="2" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="2 2" pointer-events="stroke"/>
             <path d="M 421 295 L 421 310.5" fill="none" stroke="#558fc1" stroke-width="2" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="2 2" pointer-events="stroke"/>
             <path d="M 236 118 L 207.7 118 Q 197.7 118 197.69 128 L 197.65 162" fill="none" stroke="#5fb5ab" stroke-width="2" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="2 2" pointer-events="stroke"/>
             <path d="M 306 118 L 330 118 Q 340 118 350 117.85 L 374 117.5" fill="none" stroke="#5fb5ab" stroke-width="2" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="2 2" pointer-events="stroke"/>
             <path d="M 215.15 187 L 224.58 187 Q 234 187 234 187.5 L 234 188" fill="none" stroke="#558fc1" stroke-width="2" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="2 2" pointer-events="stroke"/>
             <path d="M 180.15 212 L 180.15 225.25" fill="none" stroke="#959595" stroke-width="2" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="2 2" pointer-events="stroke"/>
             
             <image x="154.5" y="224.75" width="50.3" height="79.75"
             xlink:href="data:image/png;base64,"
             preserveAspectRatio="none"/>

             <image x="6.5" y="-0.5" width="56" height="56"
             xlink:href="data:image/png;base64,"
             preserveAspectRatio="none"/>
             
             <image x="107.5" y="-0.5" width="56" height="56"
             xlink:href="data:image/png;base64,"
             preserveAspectRatio="none"/>
             
             <image x="74.5" y="296.25" width="82" height="82"
             xlink:href="data:image/png;base64,"
             preserveAspectRatio="none"/>
             
             <image x="387" y="310" width="67" height="67" 
             xlink:href="data:image/png;base64,"
             preserveAspectRatio="none"/>
             
             <image x="373.5" y="78.5" width="77" height="77"
             xlink:href="data:image/png;base64,"
             preserveAspectRatio="none"/>
                        
         </g>
     </svg> 
  </div>
actions: null
bindings:
  - bind: return hass.states["sensor.sunsynk_input"].attributes.pv1 + ' W'
    selector: '#pv1_power_186'
    type: html
  - bind: return hass.states["sensor.sunsynk_input"].attributes.pv2 + ' W'
    selector: '#pv2_power_187'
    type: html
  - bind: return hass.states["sensor.sunsynk_input"].attributes.pv + ' W'
    selector: '#pvtotal_power'
    type: html
  - bind: return hass.states["sensor.sunsynk_battery"].attributes.temp + ' C'
    selector: '#battery_voltage_183'
    type: html
  - bind: return hass.states["sensor.sunsynk_battery"].attributes.soc + ' %'
    selector: '#battery_soc_184'
    type: html
  - bind: return hass.states["sensor.sunsynk_battery"].attributes.power + ' W'
    selector: '#battery_out_190'
    type: html
  - bind: return hass.states["sensor.sunsynk_battery_depletion"].state
    selector: '#battery_left'
    type: html
  - bind: return hass.states["sensor.sunsynk_load"].attributes.totalpower + ' W'
    selector: '#inverter_out_175'
    type: html
  - bind: return hass.states["sensor.sunsynk_load"].attributes.calc_current + ' A'
    selector: '#inverter_out_164'
    type: html
  - bind: return hass.states[""].state + ' W'
    selector: '#aux_power_166'
    type: html
  - bind: return hass.states["sensor.sunsynk_load"].attributes.totalpower + ' W'
    selector: '#ess_power'
    type: html
  - bind: return hass.states["sensor.sunsynk_grid"].attributes.volt + ' V'
    selector: '#inverter_grid_voltage_154'
    type: html
  - bind: return hass.states["sensor.sunsynk_grid"].attributes.fac  + ' Hz'
    selector: '#inverter_load_freq_192'
    type: html
  - bind: return hass.states["sensor.sunsynk_grid"].attributes.power + ' W'
    selector: '#inverter_load_grid_167'
    type: html
  - bind: return hass.states["sensor.sunsynk_grid"].attributes.power + ' W'
    selector: '#grid_external_power_172'
    type: html
  - bind: >-
      return parseInt(hass.states["sensor.sunsynk_grid"].attributes.power) -
      parseInt(hass.states["sensor.grid_inverter_load"].state) + ' W'
    selector: '#non_ess_power'
    type: html
